original_text: Inline validation on forms will help users identify and correct errors in real-time, improving efficiency and reducing frustration.
units: Inline validation on forms will help users identify and correct errors in real - time , improving efficiency and reducing frustration .

original_text: All interactive elements must have large touch targets to accommodate users with motor impairments and improve usability on smaller screens.
units: All interactive elements must have large touch targets to accommodate users with motor impairments and improve usability on smaller screens .
